name: Boss Monster
description: Boss Monster is a dungeon-building game based on the boardgame of the same name.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual Core Memory: 512 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 400 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: Dual Core+ Memory: 512 MB RAM DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 600 MB available space
